author: Amazon Customer

review: This was purchased to add to the other streaming devices in the house - a Roku 2 and Google Chromecast. This is by far the fastest interface and smoothest streaming device out of the three. From almost the first use of the interface, you can see that the additional memory and choice of processor makes this screaming fast. I have streamed many shows from Amazon, Netflix, and other sources with buffering of the stream almost non-existent. Playback starts very quickly as well.The only complaint, is that there is less content with the Amazon FIre TV at this point. But, it's a new device with content sure to be added as time goes on.For anyone without a streaming box today, this is one that should be seriously considered.
author: Steve Alexander "Steve"

review: I love my roku and was so excited that amazon was coming out with a product -- believing that if it was from amazon it would be great.  I purchased this as a gift for my parents and when we worked with it found that when searching for a movie always got kicked out of the app we were at and redirected to the amazon -- pay for movie app.  This is very frustrating and my parents immediately didn't want it because of the frustration level.  I sent it back and got a roku for my parents and they love it!  Amazon was very quick with the return and refund -- that is what I expect from amazon -- but this product they are going to have to up their game to live up to "amazon standards" I have come to expect.  this product also does not support the acorn tv app ---  that is also frustrating.
